creator: pulsifer3@comcast.net
text:
As implemented in the current version of httpd, FollowSymLinks overrides
SymLinksIfOwnerMatch.  This is not clear in the documentation and server error
msgs.  The corrections are listed at
http://mail-archives.apache.org/mod_mbox/httpd-dev/200706.mbox/%3c005501c7ad6b$39b81620$660aa8c0@apt23%3e

creator: takashi.asfbugzilla@tks.st
text: *** Bug 43774 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
